author: Gerbil
title: Beautiful little scene
review:
I got this at the same time as set 40120, Valentine's Day Dinner. Between them they've inspired me to create my own displays built to the same rules, and I'm currently at 8 and counting... :)

Box/Instructions

 

Parts

Fantastic! These small sets come jam-packed with detailed and useful little pieces. I regret not buying more just for the variety contained within. Highlights are the artist's palette, the chicken (my first), printed clock and the wall elements.

Minifigures

The mum is nice enough, but the kid is the stand-out. A fantastic T-shirt design combined with *that* panicking face is just perfect!

The build

Very simple as you'd expect.

The completed model

So much detail! I love this and set 40120, and combined with my MOCs inspired by them, they look great all together.

Overall opinion

For the price you really, really can't go wrong. I regret not buying more, as the piece selection is great, it comes with 2 decent minifigures, and well, eggs. If you find these, snap them up!
